text:
Protect yourself & others from getting sick:
Wash your hands
🧼after coughing or sneezing
🧼when caring for the sick
🧼before, during & after you prepare food
🧼before eating
🧼after toilet use
🧼when hands are visibly dirty
🧼after handling animals or animal waste
